item.title: Lifesmart TM2202 3-in-1 Treadmill Review: Best for Small Spaces
item.description: This compact, hybrid machine can morph into a walking pad, treadmill, or standing desk for small office spaces.

item.title: Apple tries to delay ruling that bars it from taking a cut on external app payments
item.description: Apple is trying to delay a court ruling that forces the company to let iOS app developers accept payments via non-Apple systems and avoid paying a cut...

item.title: VC firm Insight Partners confirms personal data stolen during January hack
item.description: The venture capital firm has over $90 billion in assets under management, including cybersecurity giants.

item.title: Asking chatbots for short answers can increase hallucinations, study finds
item.description: Turns out, telling an AI chatbot to be concise could make it hallucinate more than it otherwise would have. That’s according to a new study from Giska...

item.title: Zero Breeze Mark 3 AC Review: Effective Portable Cooling
item.description: The third iteration of the essential grab-and-go AC unit has more power, but it’s heavier and significantly pricier.
